abstract: The deal was  “reached swiftly and amicably,” said CBS’s president, Leslie Moonves, even as a stand-off with Time Warner Cable persisted.
snippet: The deal was  “reached swiftly and amicably,” said CBS’s president, Leslie Moonves, even as a stand-off with Time Warner Cable persisted.
lead_paragraph: CBS announced Thursday morning that it had completed a new retransmission deal with Verizon’s FiOS TV service, pointedly connecting the resolution to its dispute with Time Warner Cable.

headline.main: CBS Trumpets Deal With FiOS TV in Jab at Time Warner Cable
